name: Best Man
description: The groom's chief assistant during a wedding ceremony

name: Maid of Honor
description: The bride's chief assistant during a wedding ceremony

name: Groomsman
description: A male attendant to the groom

name: Bridesmaid
description: A female attendant to the bride

name: Ring Bearer
description: A young attendant who carries the wedding rings

name: Flower Girl
description: A young attendant who scatters flowers down the aisle

name: Father of the Bride
description: The bride's father

name: Mother of the Bride
description: The bride's mother

name: Father of the Groom
description: The groom's father

name: Mother of the Groom
description: The groom's mother

name: Usher
description: Someone who helps seat guests and assists during the ceremony

name: Officiant
description: The person who performs the wedding ceremony

name: Godparent
description: A ceremonial role at a baby shower or christening

name: Guest of Honor
description: A special guest being celebrated (for anniversary or other events)

name: Family Member
description: Any family relation

name: Friend
description: A friend of the host(s)

name: Colleague
description: A work associate

name: Plus One
description: A guest's date or companion

name: Child
description: A child guest

name: Vendor
description: Service provider (photographer, caterer, etc.)
